name: TempDesired
comment: desired temperature (day temperature) for DHW

name: LegioStartDay
comment: Start day for legio protection

name: LegioStartTime
comment: Start time for legio protection

name: SolGainPressLowDelay
comment: Set TRUE for LP delay in case of solar gain

name: IsInHoliday
comment: TRUE if holiday is active

name: IsInBankHoliday
comment: TRUE if BankHoliday is active

name: IsInSystemOff
comment: TRUE if SystemOff is active

name: OperatingMode430
comment: Operating mode of solar DHW circuit for 430 (1 = auto, 2 = manual, 3 = off)

name: OperatingMode470
comment: Operating mode of solar DHW circuit for 470 (1 = auto, 3 = off, 4 = on)

name: FlowTempDesired
comment: Flow temperature setpoint calculated by VR68

name: ActualTempDesired
comment: Current tank setpoint. Depends on the programmed period and current time, operating mode â€¦

name: ManualStorageTempDesired
comment: DHW setpoint in case of manual mode

name: QuickVetoTempDesired
comment: DHW setpoint in case of quick veto

name: LegionellaPump
comment: Legionella pump

name: HwcLegioProtectionMaxTimer
comment: Maximal time the legio protection state is hold (indepent of reached temperature)

name: LegionellaProtectionActive
comment: TRUE if legionella protection is active

name: HwcTempOffset
comment: Offset between desired temperature and setpoint

name: HwcLaggingTime
comment: Lagging time after tank loading

name: HwcLoadingHysteresis
comment: Hysteresis for DHW tank loading, if there is no special hysteresis (legionella, frost protection...).

name: HwcLoadingRequest
comment: Flag: Loading request to the energy manager for DHW

name: HwcLoadingEnabled
comment: Flag: Loading enabled by the energy manager

name: HwcLegioTempOkTimer
comment: Time for which the temperature for legio protection should be hold

name: IsInQuickVeto
comment: Flag: Quick veto active

name: IsInOneOffLoading
comment: TRUE if one off loading is active
